Description: Owner posted, No agent fee! Quiet corner unit in a professionally managed condo building in the heart of winter hill, One assigned off-street parking lot included, additional street parking. laundry in building, hot water/water and snow removal are included in the rent, 2 bedrooms (13 x 13 and 10 x 11) , big living room (11 x 16), Newer bath, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances large fridge (2020), stove, microwave, dishwasher, A/C, Bus station downstairs with routes to Lechmere, Sullivan and Davis Square, all Boston T accessible, 8 min walk to Gilman square green line station Easy access to 93 and 28, next door restaurants, pubs, bakery, grocery stores & banks first month and last month plus deposit. Credit/background check required
